mixins.name: rmd-btn-unstyled
mixins.description:
A simple mixin to create an unstyled button.

NOTE: An unstyled button removed the `outline-style` so you *must* add a custom focus behavior with
either ripples or something else for keyboard users.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-base
usedBy.description: The base styles for a button.

variables.name: rmd-btn-text-border-radius
variables.description: The border radius to apply to text buttons.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

variables.name: rmd-btn-text-horizontal-padding
variables.description: The amount of left and right padding to apply to text buttons.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

variables.name: rmd-btn-text-vertical-padding
variables.description:
The amount of top and bottom padding to apply to text buttons. Since buttons
are now displayed as inline-flex, it is generally recommended to keep this value
at 0 and just increase the height of the button instead.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

variables.name: rmd-btn-text-min-width
variables.description: The min width for text buttons.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

variables.name: rmd-btn-text-icon-size
variables.description:
The text button's icon size. This is than the normal icon size by default since buttons
have additional padding. You can set this to `null` if you want consistent icon sizes.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

usedBy.name: rmd-btn-text
usedBy.description: Creates the base styles for a text button.

variables.name: rmd-btn-icon-border-radius
variables.description: The border radius to apply to all icon buttons.

variables.name: rmd-btn-icon-size
variables.description: The height and width to apply to an icon button.

variables.name: rmd-btn-hover-background-color
variables.description:
The background color to apply when a button is hovered. This will be applied in the `::after`
pseudo element so it is recommended to be either black or white with an opacity applied.

variables.name: rmd-btn-background-color-transition-time
variables.description: The transition duration for the hover background color to be applied.

variables.name: rmd-btn-box-shadow-width
variables.description: The base box-shadow width to apply to buttons

variables.name: rmd-btn-box-shadow
variables.description:
The base box-shadow to apply to buttons when outlined. This will normally be used along with a color variable
to define a box shadow.

variables.name: rmd-btn-contained-elevation-transition-time
variables.description: The transition time for a contained button to raise to the pressed elevation.

usedBy.name: react-md-button
usedBy.description: Creates all the styles for buttons within react-md.

variables.name: rmd-btn-contained-resting-elevation
variables.description:
The elevation to use for a resting contained button. This should be a number between
0 and 24.

usedBy.name: react-md-button
usedBy.description: Creates all the styles for buttons within react-md.

variables.name: rmd-btn-contained-pressed-elevation
variables.description:
The elevation to use for a contained button that is being pressed. This should be a number
between 0 and 24.

usedBy.name: react-md-button
usedBy.description: Creates all the styles for buttons within react-md.
